column4: could someone please help me with my cascading style sheets issue?
does that include problems with programs crashing when editing a css file?
Er, depends on the program :)  Which program?
the thing is, nautilus crashes when inside a directory with a css file
which is why I thought this was the channel for help
You know how you have to go down the list each time, and hit enter on the part of the install you would like to continue with? I seem to remember lilo being after grub
In that case, sorry this is the right channel... but your problem isnt a CSS one, its a nautilus one :)
Dalkus; except it also happens with gedit and the archive program
have you searched google for the problem?
I also searched the forums, with no success
sorry try asking in a few hours :)
